title: CCI approves Tata Motors Finance merger with Tata Capital
description: The Competition Commission of India has approved the merger of Tata Motor Finance with Tata Capital. This merger, announced in June, will result in Tata Motors holding a 4.7% stake in the merged entity. The move aligns with Tata Motors' strategy to exit non-core businesses and focus on emerging technologies and products.
